events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position and have started processing it.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on the keywords found in the resume such as software and developer.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate throughout the recruitment process.
The initial screening was conducted successfully, and the candidate demonstrated solid knowledge of software development concepts.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm for the technical interview and the opportunity to join our engineering team.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate next week to assess their programming and system design skills.
